#include <stdio.h>
int add(int x, int y) 
{
    int a, b;
    do {
        a = x & y;
        b = x ^ y;
        x = a << 1;
        y = b;
    } while (a);
    return b;
}
int inline inp()
{
    int n=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c < '0' || c >'9') {c=getchar_unlocked();}
    while(c>='0' && c<='9')
    {
    n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0';
    c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return n;
}
int main(void) 
{
	int n1,n2;
	n1=inp();
	n2=inp();
	printf("%d\n",add(n1,n2));
	return 0;
}
